analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x4ebdf71e4455f99100923297c959534af7f6435a.sol:
	Contract SLCCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x4ebdf71e4455f99100923297c959534af7f6435a.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
